ValidationRule.description:
If Transmission Method = "Chase 401k", "ACH 401k" and "Contribution Type" = ER Match, Money Purchase Plan, Profit Sharing, QNEC, Safe Harbor (NEC), or Top Heavy
Make “Input” a required field before the object can be updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Input__c, ""), NOT(ISNULL( Tentative_Trade_Date__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL(Transmission_Method__c, "Chase 401k"), ISPICKVAL(Transmission_Method__c, "ACH 401k")), OR( ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c, "ER Match"), ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c, "Money Purchase Plan"), ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c, "Profit Sharing"), ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c , "QNEC"), ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c , "Safe Harbor (NEC)"), ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c , "Top Heavy"), ISPICKVAL(Contribution_Type__c , "Multiple")))
